units.name: Commander In Coldstar Battlesuit
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: high-output burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

datasheet.name: Coldstar Commander
datasheet.description:
While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.|Datasheet||
000000402|5|||Battlesuit Support System|The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.|Wargear||
000000402|6|||Shield Generator|The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.|Wargear||
000000402|7|||Weapon Support System|Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.|Wargear||
000000403|1|000008343||||Core||
000000404|1|000008346||||Core||
000000404|2|000008439||||Faction||
000000404|3|||Hover Drone|The bearer can FLY and has a Move characteristic of 10".|Wargear||

units.name: Tactical Drones
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: twin pulse carbine; close combat weapon.

units.name: Ethereal
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: honour stave.

datasheet.name: Failure Is Not an Option
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Coordinated Leadership
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.|Datasheet||

units.name: Cadre Fireblade
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fireblade pulse rifle; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Volley Fire
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

datasheet.name: Crack Shot
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.|Datasheet||

units.name: Commander Farsight
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: high-intensity plasma rifle; Dawn Blade.

datasheet.name: Way of the Short Blade
datasheet.description:
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000000406|5|||Puretide's Teachings|Once per battle round, you can target this model’s unit with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||
000000406|6|||INDEPENDENT POWER|If your army includes COMMANDER FARSIGHT, it cannot include any ETHEREAL units. If your army includes any ETHEREAL units, it cannot include COMMANDER FARSIGHT.|Special (правая колонка)||
000000407|1|000008345||||Core||
000000407|2|000008336||||Core||
000000407|3|000008337||||Core||
000000407|4|000008439||||Faction||
000000407|5|||Advanced Guardian Drone|Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Wargear||
000000407|6|||Agile Combatant|This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.|Datasheet||
000000407|7|||Command-link Drone (Aura)|While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.|Wargear||

units.name: Commander Shadowsun
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: flechette launcher; 2 high-energy fusion blasters; light missile pod; pulse pistol; battlesuit fists; advanced guardian drone; command-link drone.

datasheet.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||
000000407|9|||SUPREME COMMANDER|If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||
000000408|1|000008346||||Core||
000000408|2|||Inspirational Defiance|While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.|Datasheet||
000000408|3|||Martial Warrior|Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to be active while resolving those attacks: Direct Grace: Fidelity has the [PRECISION] ability. Forceful Strike: Fidelity has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability. Whirling Stance: Fidelity has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead of [SUSTAINED HITS 1].|Datasheet||
000000409|1|000008336||||Core||
000000409|2|||Duality Shield|Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.|Datasheet||
000000409|3|||Paradox of Duality|Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000000409|4|||Supreme Loyalty (Aura)|While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.|Datasheet||

units.name: Aun’shi
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fidelity.

units.name: Aun’va
units.loadout: Aun’Va is equipped with: close combat weapon.Each Ethereal Guard is equipped with: supreme honour blade.

units.name: Darkstrider
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Shade; close combat weapon.

core.name: Structural Analyser
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.
core.parameter: 000000410 | 5 | | | Structural Analyser | While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Jammer Array
core.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.
core.parameter: 000000410 | 6 | | | Jammer Array | Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model. | Datasheet | |

units.name: Strike Team
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: pulse pistol; pulse rifle; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Suppression Volley
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: DS8 Support Turret
datasheet.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon. Designer’s Note: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.|Datasheet||

units.name: Breacher Team
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: pulse blaster; pulse pistol; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Breach and Clear
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: DS8 Support Turret
datasheet.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon. Designer’s Note: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.|Datasheet||

units.name: Kroot Carnivores
units.loadout: The Lang-quill is equipped with: Kroot pistol; Kroot rifle; close combat weapon.Every Kroot Carnivore is equipped with: Kroot rifle; close combat weapon.

core.name: Fieldcraft
core.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
core.parameter: 000000413 | 3 | | | Fieldcraft | At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. | Datasheet | |

core.name: BODYGUARD
core.description: If this unit has a Starting Strength of 20, you can attach up to two Leader units to it instead of one, provided those Leaders are not duplicates (e.g. you cannot attach two WAR SHAPERS to this unit). If you do, and this unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with  their original Starting Strengths.
core.parameter: 000000413 | 4 | | | BODYGUARD | If this unit has a Starting Strength of 20, you can attach up to two Leader units to it instead of one, provided those Leaders are not duplicates (e.g. you cannot attach two WAR SHAPERS to this unit). If you do, and this unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with their original Starting Strengths. | Special (правая колонка) | |

units.name: Krootox Riders
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: repeater cannon; close combat weapon; Krootox fists.

datasheet.name: Kroot Packmates
datasheet.description:
Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a friendly KROOT INFANTRY unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, that unit with this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).|Datasheet||
000000415|1|000008344||||Core|7"

units.name: Kroot Hounds
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: ripping fangs.

datasheet.name: Loping Pounce
datasheet.description:
At the start of your Command phase, if this unit is within 6" of one or more friendly KROOT INFANTRY units, then until the end of the turn, this unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.|Datasheet||
000000415|4|||Hunting Hounds|While this unit is within 12" of one or more friendly KROOT CHARACTER models, the Objective Control characteristic of models in this unit is 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Stealth Battlesuits
units.loadout: The Stealth Shas’vre model is equipped with: burst cannon; battlesuit fists; homing beacon. Every Stealth Shas’ui model is equipped with: burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

datasheet.name: Battlesuit Support System
datasheet.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Homing Beacon
datasheet.description: Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and not within 9" of any enemy units.Designer’s Note: Place a Homing Beacon token next to this unit, removing it once this ability is used.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Forward Observers
datasheet.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Crisis Battlesuits
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

datasheet.name: Battlesuit Support System
datasheet.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Shield Generator
datasheet.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Weapon Support System
datasheet.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Turbo-jets
datasheet.description:
Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Target Uploaded
datasheet.description: Once per turn, when using the Greater Good ability, you can select this unit to be an Observer unit for a second time. When doing so, you can change which enemy unit is this unit’s Spotted unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Grav-inhibitor Drone
datasheet.description: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer’s unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Pulse Accelerator Drone
datasheet.description:
Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Drone Harassment Tactics
datasheet.description:
At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

000000424|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000424|2|000008439||||Faction||
000000424|3|||Rapid Deployment|Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.|Datasheet||
000000424|4|||One Shot|The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.|Wargear profile||

000000425|2|000008439||||Faction||
000000425|3|||Ground Strike Fighter|Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that cannot FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||
000000425|4|||One Shot|The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.|Wargear profile||
000000426|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000426|2|000008439||||Faction||
000000426|3|||Pulse Bombs|Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.|Datasheet||
000000426|4|||One Shot|The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.|Wargear profile||

datasheet.description:

datasheet.name: Drone Escort
datasheet.description:
Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, the unit using this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Reinforced Cover
datasheet.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Fortification
datasheet.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.|Datasheet||

core.name: Loping Stride
core.description: Each time this model Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.

datasheet.description:
While a friendly KROOT unit is within 3" of the bearer, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.|Wargear||
000001392|4|||Hooked|Each time the bearer makes an attack with this weapon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, if a hit is scored, until the end of the turn, if the bearer selects that unit as a target of a charge, add 2 to Charge rolls made for the bearer and enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer.|Wargear profile||

core.name: Trail Finding
core.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model’s unit, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

core.name: Kroot Ambush
core.description: After both players have deployed their armies, you can redeploy this model’s unit and one other friendly KROOT unit. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.
core.parameter: 000003702 | 6 | | | Kroot Ambush | After both players have deployed their armies, you can redeploy this model’s unit and one other friendly KROOT unit. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Fire and Fade

core.name: Kroot Linebreakers
core.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of these mortal wounds, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

core.name: For the Dark Gods

core.name: Cult Icon
core.description: In your Command phase, you can return up to D3 destroyed models to the bearer’s unit.
